name: Apodrakosis Eternal Recurrence of Trailokya
desc: Special Summon 1 "Apodrakosis" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but return it to the hand during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Apodrakosis" Continuous Spell you control or in your GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Apodrakosis Eternal Recurrence of Trailokya" once per turn.
